overview: Due to an accident, Johnny is forced by his adoptive parents to leave their province. He moves to Manila together with his younger brother Utoy. Johnny is hired to replace Boogey as the driver and bodyguard of Jessica. Rage and envy turned Boogey to Mon (Ramon Christopher) and started working against Jessica's family. Johnny must then find a way to protect the threat to Jessica's life.
title: Ang Kuya Kong Siga
